column6: "OLD MAN LOGAN" Part 3 (of 8) 50 years after the super heroes died, WOLVERINE and the blind archer, HAWKEYE, journey across a ruined America. Next stop: Cedar City, Utah-home of the man who killed Magneto: the all-new, all-different KINGPIN!
column8: | other:Chris Eliopoulos | colorist:Morry Hollowell | colorist:Jason Keith | colorist:Justin Ponsor | penciller:Steve McNiven | writer:Mark Millar | letterer:Cory Petit | inker:Dexter Vines
